verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The joy of the Lord is my strength, The joy of the Lord is my strength, The joy of the Lord is my strength, The joy of the Lord is my strength.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If you want joy you must clap for it, If you want joy you must clap for it, If you want joy you must clap for it, If you want joy you must clap for it.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He gives me living water and I thirst for more, He gives me living water and I thirst for more, He gives me living water and I thirst for more, He gives me living water and I thirst for more.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The joy of the Lord is my strength, The joy of the Lord is my strength, The joy of the Lord is my strength, The joy of the Lord is my strength.{/lang-eng}
